pr_title: xds: implement cert-provider bootstrap config as per design

timeline.message: xds: implement cert-provider bootstrap config as per design

timeline.bodyText: Any reason not to init with defaults before calling extractMeshCaServerConfig?
timeline.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText: I wanted to encapsulate init to defaults and validation of MeshCa config in this method. I don't think there is any qualitative difference between the 2 approaches. WDYT?
replies.author: sanjaypujare
